titles.title: A resolution to authorize testimony and representation in United States v. Neely.
A resolution to authorize testimony and representation in United States v. Neely.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution authorizes Michael J. Mastrian, Director of the Senate Radio and Television Gallery, to testify in the case of United States v. Neely. It also authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Mr. Mastrian and any current or former officer or employee of his office in connection with this case.
